Frequently Asked Questions

Is it online training or physical?

Our training programs are primarily online, allowing flexible access from anywhere.

Do you provide E-Certificate?

Yes, participants receive an E-Certificate upon completion of the course.

Do you provide GIS/Remote sensing services?

Yes, we offer GIS and remote sensing services tailored to your needs. Please contact us for details.
